data.actual_result: The suggestion pop-up appears, and selecting something from the pop-up crashes the app.
data.expected_result: The suggestion pop-up should not appear when the mention gets deleted.
data.short_description: Mention suggestion pop-up appears when @mention is deleted
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a text channel. - Type a mention in the form username#0000 (or select a user from the suggestion pop-up). - Type a long string of text after the mention. You can paste in a long URL or type a bunch of random letters. - Hold backspace. After a brief moment, iOS will begin deleting words instead of characters. - Observe how the suggestion pop-up appears when the mention gets deleted. - (Optional) Selecting a suggestion from the pop-up causes the app to crash.
